data.name: ABOUT_LABEL_DESCRIPTION
data.value:
Hail, and thanks for wielding mine humble client! ’Tis yet in alpha, where many a thing remaineth unfinished. I would fain receive thy counsel for new wonders to craft or faults to mend.
This device seeketh to o’ertake Bluesky entire. Forasmuch as the official app and web do employ the public API, so too may a third-party vessel. All features of Bluesky (and perchance more) shall I graft into this craft.
Contact: gigggity@proton.me / gigggity.bsky.social
Cerulean for Bluesky, OmegaAOL 2025. The “Bluesky” mark belongeth unto Bluesky Social, PBC.

data.name: LOGIN_BUTTON_FORGOTPASS
data.value: Hast thou mislaid thy secret word?

data.name: LOGIN_LINKLABEL_NEWACCOUNT
data.value: Dost thou seek a fresh account?

data.name: LOGIN_LOCALMSG_CONNECTING_TO_PDS_SUB
data.value: Cerulean now maketh passage unto the chosen PDS host. Should authentication falter, examine thy settings and tokens once more.

data.name: LOGIN_LOCALMSG_DEFAULT_SUB
data.value: Sign in with thy Bluesky account, prithee. ’Tis well to wield an app password.

data.name: LOGIN_LOCALMSG_EMPTY_FIELD_SUB
data.value: Let both handle and secret word be writ, lest thou be denied.

data.name: LOGIN_LOCALMSG_INVALID_DEBUGCODE_SUB
data.value: The debug code thou hast entered is but a counterfeit token.

data.name: PDS_CBOX_INVALID_CHAR
data.value: The URL thou useth is unfit. Remember, no slashes nor strange characters at the end.

data.name: PDS_CBOX_PDS_PING_ERROR
data.value: We cannot descry the software of PDS server {0}. ’Tis either no PDS or unmeet for Cerulean.

data.name: PDS_CBOX_PDS_PING_RESULT
data.value: PDS server {0}/ liveth. The server runneth software version {1}. Cerulean may embrace it.

data.name: PDS_CBOX_URL_RESET
data.value: The PDS host hath been reset to {0}.

data.name: PDS_CBOX_URL_SAVED
data.value: Thy custom PDS host hath been kept safe.

data.name: PDS_LABEL_DESCRIPTION
data.value:
A Bluesky PDS holdeth thy chronicles and doth federate with the wider AT Protocol to forge a social web.
Thou may’st host thine own PDS. To have Cerulean employ thine rather than the default (https://bsky.social), alter it here.
No official succour existeth for other microblogging realms.

data.name: RESETPW_INFOLABEL_STRONG_PASSWORD
data.value: A stout secret word is commended

data.name: RESETPW_LABEL_STEP1
data.value: 1) Inscribe the e-mail thou didst employ to join Bluesky. A missive of reset shall reach thee.

data.name: RESETPW_LABEL_STEP2
data.value: 2) Pen a new secret word of thine own choosing, withal the reset token delivered to thy hand.
